mapper.update: update wtm_office_member set isAccessNow = 1 where isAccessNow=0 AND memberId=#{memberId} AND unix_timestamp(now())-createTime < 60*60;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wtm_office_member WHERE isAccessNow=0 AND finishedTime is NULL AND unix_timestamp(now())-createTime>#{time}
mapper.select: select * from wtm_office_member m WHERE m.memberId=#{memberId} AND m.officeAccountId=#{officialAccountId}
select * from wtm_office_member m WHERE m.memberId=#{memberId} AND m.isAccessNow=0
select * from wtm_office_member member WHERE member.openId=#{openid}

select a.userName accountName,login.nickname nickName,member.sex,a.originId,a.imageUrl from wtm_office_member m LEFT JOIN wtm_official_accounts a ON a.id=m.officeAccountId LEFT JOIN wtm_member member ON member.id=m.memberId LEFT JOIN wtm_third_login login ON member.id=login.memberId WHERE m.memberId=#{memberId} AND m.isAccessNow=0 AND login.sourceType=#{sourceType} limit 7;
